title: Review Sales Discounting Process
description: An operational auditor analyzes the process for applying discounts to sales orders to identify potential revenue leakage.

tasks.description: Analyze sales data for the past year to identify which sales reps are applying the highest average discounts.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor identifies two reps who are outliers with significantly higher discount rates.

tasks.description: Review the discount approval process and find that discounts under 15% do not require manager approval.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor identifies a potential control weakness in the approval threshold.

tasks.description: Recommend a lower approval threshold and additional training for the sales team on the discount policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor proposes a concrete recommendation to improve the process.
